alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 11:58AM CST until January 02 at 12:45PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Monroe County in eastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Central Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 1245 PM CST. * At 1158 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gillett, or 19 miles north of Dumas, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gillett... St. Charles... De Witt... Indian Bay... Ethel... De Luce... Crocketts Bluff... Lawrenceville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
